info.title: Calendar
info.description: Calendar API  supplies an accurate and reliable information about holidays all over the world. Metropolis also provides an useful date calculator and a week day indicator [This API is deprecated].

get.description: Use this endpoint to add or subtract any number of days given a specific date. Add or subtract days to a given date (for example: ignoring weekends) to calculate a past or future event. Usage sample: What date will it be in 30 workdays ?

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: "ISO 2 letter country code" or "Name of the Country in English"

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Days to be added or subtracted given the start date.

parameters.name: just-workdays
parameters.description: "True" - Days in result will include just work days. Weekends will not be considered during the calculation.  "False" - Days in result will include all days (including Weekends).  Caution: We are sorry, but holidays are not considered at this time.

get.description: Check if a provided date is holiday, given a desired country location.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: "ISO 2 letter country code" or "Name of the Country in English"

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Reference date. Format: yyyy-mm-dd. Caution: we are sorry, but just the year 2014 is implemented at this time. More to come.

parameters.name: idiom
parameters.description: Default is English. "ISO639-1". Translation service by querying google translation API. Caution: Using this (on the fly) translation service can be time consuming.

get.description: Information about the holidays around the world. This endpoint provides a list of holidays observed throughout year 2014, including the date, weekname and description of the holiday.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: "ISO 2 letter country code" or "Name of the Country in English"

parameters.name: idiom
parameters.description: Default is English. "ISO639-1". Translation service by querying google translation API. Caution: Using this (on the fly) translation service can be time consuming.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Year (yyyy). Caution: we are sorry, but just the year 2014 is implemented at this time. More to come.

get.description: This endpoint provides the weekname and week-number information from a given input date.
